A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Don’t get me wrong the movie was beautifully done in basically every way. But I cant ignore the fact that this director thought it was a good idea to have a filler with a main character. And on top of that a lot of questions that needed to be answered were either quickly done or not at all. So in a way I’m glad that JJ will be finishing off the trilogy\, because this Director got away with so much that effected a lot of us fans. Ps I’m still going to buy this movie on Blu ray and will be rewatching it through out my life. It just felt like it missed out on so much more.
